name: Fading Out
description:
Fading Out is an experimental game about the executive dysfunction and lethargy that manifests in many of those with mental illnesses. We hope to, through this game, build empathy for neurodivergent people through the frustration one might feel when playing, so that we might repair the misinformed idea that those who experience these things are "lazy." 

Your friend is out of town, and you're on your own for the week. Your task: keep your apartment livable until they return by completing your daily chores such as making your bed, washing the dishes, and doing laundry.

Controls:
- WASD movement
- Follow prompts to complete tasks
- B when in bed to go to bed (yes, going to bed is hard! Move around until you find that sweet spot)
